argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | subgngp.h | |- H = ( G |`s A ) |
| 2 |  | subgnm.n | |- N = ( norm ` G ) |
| 3 |  | subgnm.m | |- M = ( norm ` H ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_subgnm | |- ( A e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> M = ( N |` A ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_fveq1d | |- ( A e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> ( M ` X ) = ( ( N |` A ) ` X ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_fvres | |- ( X e. A -> ( ( N |` A ) ` X ) = ( N ` X ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_sylan9eq | |- ( ( A e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ X e. A ) -> ( M ` X ) = ( N ` X ) ) |
